name: "I merely drift around amongst the street creating peripatetic postcards."
description:
Oliver Weber

"I merely drift around amongst the street creating peripatetic postcards."

Interviews // Photographs 

The newspaper - edition
of the book ANALOGUE

Limited edition of 100 high-quality newspapers, manually signed and numbered.

First published in London, GB in 2011

by Photographers Club,
London

Format: Newspaper
Size: 32 x 46 cm
Pages: 12
Printing: Offset Newsprint 

Website: www.olicito.de

name: Oliver Weber: ANALOGUE - limited Edition 1-20
description:
A N A L O G U E
Photographs // Interviews by
Oliver Weber

limited edition of 500 numbered and signed copies.

(2nd Edition)

published in New York, USA in 2011 by VirgenBooks, Inc.

Format: Hardcover
Size: 8x6 inch.
Pages: 72

Numbers 1-20
come with a signed print (7x5 inch. - carefully handmade by me on ILFORD MG IV RC DE LUXE paper).
89,- Euro (plus shipping).

Numbers 21-500
39,- Euro (plus shipping).


Website: www.olicito.de
